Experience.name: AB180 (Seoul, Korea)
Experience.summary: AB180 is a B2B martech company providing MMP(mobile measurement partner) and MMM(media mix modeling) solutions. Worked on devising LT guided MMM via machine learning.

Experience.name: AIRS Medical (Seoul, Korea)
Experience.summary: AIRS Medical is a company accelerating MR imaging through deep learning. Worked on devising adequate DL architectures for image restoration and implemented algorithms for signal processing and reconstruction.
highlights: Image denoising, Image super resolution, MR reconstruction pipeline
